Open Broadway Data is an open data platform which aims to collect, display, and analyze data from all Broadway shows since 1738.

The project is currently archived, with limited ongoing development.

About this site

This archive site aims to preserve the past work of this project.

Key info:

  • If you’d like to access data, you’ll want to go here: Data

  • Learn about this project’s goals, motivations, successes, and challenges here: Project Summary

  • Get in touch
